ROM.Changelog: * Changes in this build [05 August 2018] * ==================================== * [Fixed] Random Lockscreen freezes should be gone now. * [Fixed] 1080p60fps playback in youtube. * [Improved] About Device Page. * [New] Ambient display is now configurable. * [Update] Merged July Security Patches. * [Update] Merged LineageOS Latest Changes. * [Update] Updated ROM Version to 0.35 Beta. * Some more under the hood changes.
